text: "Everybody Hurts" is a 1993 song by American alternative rock band R.E.M. and is taken from their eighth studio album Automatic for the People (1992). It went to number 3 in France, number 4 in Iceland and the Netherlands, number 6 in Australia and Ireland, number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in Canada, number 12 in New Zealand, number 29 in the United States and number 31 in Belgium. == References == Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Leona Lewis songs Category:Kylie Minogue songs Category:Westlife songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:DJ Sammy songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Robbie Williams songs Category:Take That songs Category:Susan Boyle songs Category:Jon Bon Jovi songs
title: Everybody Hurts
